channel.title: CVE Feed for Fuji Electric -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fuji Electric -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37029|2024-06-13T18:57:26.207Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-5597|2024-06-10T20:12:13.322Z -- fuji%20electric -- monitouch%20v-sft
item.description: Fuji Electric Monitouch V-SFTÂ is vulnerable to a type confusion, which could cause a crash or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-5271|2024-06-05T18:45:53.793Z -- fuji%20electric -- monitouch%20v-sft
item.description: Fuji Electric Monitouch V-SFT is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write because of a type confusion, which could result in arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-34171|2024-05-30T19:55:23.835Z -- fuji%20electric -- monitouch%20v-sft
item.description: Fuji Electric Monitouch V-SFT is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-37029|2024-06-13T17:23:40.591Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-37022|2024-06-13T17:25:49.609Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which could allow an attacker to manipulate memory, resulting in execution of arbitrary code.
